Michael Teixeira

Data Scientist & Analytics Professional

Transforming complex data into actionable business insights through advanced analytics, machine learning, and compelling data storytelling. Specialized in predictive modeling for business optimization and retention strategies.

Featured Projects

Employee Turnover Prediction

Python XGBoost scikit-learn pandas
Machine Learning Predictive Analytics HR Analytics
98.5% Accuracy 95.1% F1 Score $1.2M Potential Savings

Developed a comprehensive employee turnover solution using the PACE methodology to transform HR data into actionable intelligence, with a high-accuracy XGBoost model identifying key attrition drivers.

Project Details GitHub

Cyclistic Bike-Share User Behavior Analysis

R Tableau Data Analysis
Data Visualization Business Analytics Customer Behavior
12 Months Data Span User Conversion Strategy

Analyzed Cyclistic bike-share data to identify behavioral differences between casual and annual riders, developing strategies to convert casual riders into long-term members for improved retention and profitability.
